alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 1:28PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Elko and central Eureka Counties through 200 PM PDT... At 127 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Pine Valley, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Moderate to heavy rain which may cause minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Elko and central Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
